story.Success_Story: From Graduate to Full-Time Developer Ram Dharma, a 2023 Computer Science graduate, joined NexusCTC's Placement Guaranteed Program with a year gap in his career journey. His story is a testament to the success that this program can achieve. Ram has now secured a full-time position with a top company, and his journey is one worth listening to. Here, he shares his experience with the Nexus CTC program and tips for standing out as a fresher in today’s competitive market.
story.facingChallenges: Like many fresh graduates, Rushikesh encountered challenges while entering the healthcare domain. The competition was tough, and getting noticed by reputed companies required skill-based training and confidence. Despite multiple applications, he realized that focused training programs like Nexus CTC’s Placement Guaranteed Course were the right path to start his journey.
story.programHighlights: Rushikesh found Nexus CTC’s program flexible and practical. It focused on real-world healthcare processes, communication skills, and hands-on learning related to AR calling and RCM workflow. The training made him confident in handling real client scenarios and improved his professional approach.
story.finalEvaluation: The final evaluation mirrored real-life RCM and AR case handling tasks, which helped Rushikesh perform naturally without stress. This practice-oriented approach helped him clear interviews smoothly and secure his role at AGS Healthcare Pvt. Ltd.
story.overallExperience: Rushikesh’s experience with Nexus CTC was extremely positive. The program’s real-time learning, affordable structure, and practical projects helped him land a position at AGS Healthcare Pvt. Ltd with a package of 4.5 LPA.
